org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.tamino
Class AeLocalTxTaminoConnection

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.tamino.AeLocalTxTaminoConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeTaminoLocalTxConnection, com.softwareag.tamino.db.api.connection.TConnection
public class AeLocalTxTaminoConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeTaminoLocalTxConnection

A delegate version of a tamino connection. This class simply adds "commit" and "rollback" methods for transaction control.

Field Summary

Constructor Detail

AeLocalTxTaminoConnection

public AeLocalTxTaminoConnection(com.softwareag.tamino.db.api.connection.TConnection aConnection)
                          throws AeXMLDBException
Creates a local transaction (non auto-commit) connection. Users of this class must call commit or rollback. If commit is not called explicitely, it will be called when the connection is closed.

Parameters:
aConnection -
Throws:
com.softwareag.tamino.db.api.connection.TTransactionModeChangeException
AeXMLDBException
